overview:
Christian has a great passion for technology. Besides being an avid user, he is interested in looking at technology from a business perspective and in bringing innovations to market providing a captivating user experience. As myON-ID Media’s CTO, he is the driving force behind the strategic product development, including the iMedia LoungeTM, Germany’s leading social media content management system and secure.me, the global service for online privacy and reputation protection. He also has managed several social media projects for worldwide leading brands including corporations such as Siemens or Deutsche Telekom.

Before, Christian was responsible for the product management and internationalization for startups belonging to eTF1, France’s leading online TV media group. Prior to that job, he was in charge of the online product management at Telefonica, the international telecommunications company. Earlier, he contributed to several consultancy and research projects focused on new media and technology. He studied business at the Ludwig-Maximilians-University in Munich.Â 

Christian was born in Munich, Germany. He loves traveling, excellent food and he is enthusiastic about delicious espresso.
